name: Computer Capers
overview: You were hired by Getaway 3000 to help Indirect Software to realize their outstanding Power Amigo computer, with a 4D chip, one million megabytes of FAM a 68090 at 9 million Mhz. With it comes the games Rickman 4D, Tomb Rider and Capital Love. If you fail this mission you're fired, other wiser you're still fired but you're rich!! You start in the village of Lilypad. You've got to break into the PC headquarters to somehow snatch the PCs plans for the future from Billy Gates. This way Indirect Software may do the necessary changes to launch the great Power Amigo 2, so it can be better than the Penteum 233 BMX. Go forth and adventure!
